parameters: I... I think I'm gonna.. be...
It's time to take the fight to \C[2]Bahamut\C[0]! \C[4]Davos\C[0],
do you have any ideas on where to find them?
I do. But now that we have this airship, I may have a better idea...
Meet me below deck. It's time you knew the true origins of our enemy.
It's amazing, isn't it? As a child, I used to dream of flying.
I hope this plan works. The world is running out of time.
I think we're almost to the islands. I can see something up ahead.
Sure thing. By the way, I was thinking. This ship's the first of
its kind. We should name it. I was thinking \C[6]The Swiftwind\C[0].
Ahh, \C[6]The Orion\C[0]. Because she sails through the stars! Are you sure?
Ahh, \C[6]The Revenant\C[0]. The one who returns. I like it. Are you sure?
Ahh, \C[6]The Cloudsong\C[0]. Hopefully nobody steals it! Are you sure?
Ahh, \C[6]The Flying Flock\C[0]. Nice one! Are you sure?
I'm sure we'll have many adventures aboard \C[6]\N[25]\C[0]!
I see the islands up ahead!
I can't believe it! How is this possible!
The turbulence around these islands is rough. I'll get as close as I can.
Circle around a few times. We'll just be a little longer.
You don't sound very happy to see me.
Of course I am. It's just... all of this. It's so much to take in.
I have an idea. Are you hungry?
Oh, hello \C[4]Winter\C[0]? After two weeks, I'd hoped you'd be happier to see me.
Of course I am. It's just... all of this.
It's so much to take in.
Hey, I've got an idea. Are you hungry?
A nice evening with Davos I guess
It seems I'm not the only one who needed to clear their head.
Yes. It's just so much to take in.
When we arrive, I don't know what we'll find. I haven't seen
\C[14]The Source\C[0] in over a thousand years.
Do you think it will be angry about what's happened?
No. What most people failed to accept was that \C[14]The Source\C[0]
didn't care for the affairs of mortals. In truth, it cared little
We... we are just a passing amusement for it to study. As one
might study a colony of ants.
How can it be so heartless?
Because it doesn't need to care. If humanity ceased to exist tomorrow or
thrived for another ten thousand years, it wouldn't affect
How could people ever worship something so heartless?
Ignorance? Blind religious zeal I suppose?
Whatever the reasons, they are irrelevant now. We just have
to convince it to grant us some of its power.
And hope that we don't go mad in the process.
\C[4]Davos\C[0]... I'm sorry. For your friends. For what
you've had to endure all these years. For all of it.
It's... it will be alright, \C[4]Madilyn\C[0]. One way or another,
I feel the journey is nearing its end.
I only hope we'll still be here when it's over. It's nice to
Come on. We have a few hours before we reach the islands. Let us
inspect the foodstuffs. I believe I saw \C[4]Cid\C[0] stash a cask
GabText DON'T YOU DARE TOUCH IT!
I'm glad we got to share this evening together, \C[4]Madilyn\C[0].
With everything that's happening, at least we can say we had this time.
It's been a long time. Since I felt like I could let someone
I promise I'll take good care of it.
I've thought a lot about what you said... back at the docks. Especially
I was afraid we'd never see each other again.
But we're here now. And I want you to know that even if the whole
world goes up tomorrow, I'm happy now. Because we're together.
\C[4]CID\C[0]! Keep this bucket of bolts in the air!
The air currents around the island, they're too strong. I'm having trouble
That's not our only problem. We've got incoming!
A patrol of \C[2]Bahamut\C[0]'s demons. Brace yourselves!
I'll try to set her down easy. Hang on to something!
